entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Hunters Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
